forum.content:
Being dumped like a piece of trash leaves me extremely vulnerable especially in the dead of night.
Not knowing what I've done wrong, I can't help but bury myself in wine bottles, enjoying the atmosphere of being tipsy, seemingly having forgotten what really bothers me the most.
My life has been confined to an undefeated downfall ever since the day that I made the worst decision, which was to tell you how I felt about you.

To me, love is a struggle.
forum.title: [Sharing]
